answers.answer: Hi!One possibility for weakness in both legs is compression of spinal nerves in lumbo-sacral region, and thus MRI of lumbar and sacral spine should be done. Other possibilities are peripheral neuropathy like in diabetes, peripheral vascular disease, Reynaud’s phenomenon, Vit B12 deficiency; anxiety and panic disorder; or even due to electrolyte imbalance. Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease, polio, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, and multiple sclerosis are other possibilities.  Please discuss these possibilities with your treating doctor. Take care!

question: hi, im 29..im having some leg probs. i weigh 80kg,my legs always weak and fatigued..i cant even walk properly..cant do sports at all..i get weird pulses in my feet and back of legs..cant have sex either..it takes my legs 2 weeks to recover from sex and in that space of time and can hardly walk,at night get a lot of pulses allover legs and they feel soreness,sometimes when i walk knees jam and really hurt especially in cold weather..in warm weather they burn alot and feel uncomfortable..iDOC HELP PLEASE!
title: LEGS PROBLEM
